lyrics.text:
“Ke u ‘i he ‘Eiki pē!”
‘E, taumaiā ke fai!
Ko Hēvani ‘a e lea ko ia
Ki hoku ‘atamai.
He mo’ufononga au,
Kau hangahanga fai;
‘O hikihiki tēniti,
‘O fai ki Hēvani.

‘Api mama’o ia
‘O si’oku kakai,
‘Oku fa’a kite ofi pē
Ki hoku ‘atamai.
He mo’ufononga au! etc.

Kite ‘a e kolo ia,
Mo hono nāunau;
Kite he ngaahi matapā
Masani ange fau.
He mo’ufononga au! etc.

Hā hono fu’u kakai,
Faifai mo ongo mai,
Hangē ha hikule’o pē,
‘A e hiva ‘oku fai.
He mo’ufononga au! etc.

‘Oku fu’u feinga ai
‘A hoku ‘atamai,
Ke ne tatae atu pē
‘O kau mo e kakai.
He mo’ufononga au! etc.

Ko e kakai lelei,
Ne tau mo e kovi muʻa
Kuo nau hao atu ē,
Fe’ao mo e ‘Otua.
He mo’ufononga au! etc.

Ke u ‘i he ‘Eiki pē!
Si’i tala’ofa ia,
Te te kaveinga’aki pē
Kae’oua ke a’usia.
He mo’ufononga au!
Kau hangahanga fai!
‘O hikihiki tēniti,
‘O fai ki Hēvani.
